text: Kandi ntimukajye impaka n’abahawe igitabo (Abayahudi n’Abanaswara, mubahamagarira kugana inzira y’ukuri) mutabikoze mu buryo bwiza; uretse abahemu (inkozi z’ibibi) muri bo (babarwanya). Munababwire muti “Twemeye ibyo twamanuriwe (Qur’an) n’ibyo mwamanuriwe (Ivanjili na Tawurati(; ndetse Imana yacu ari yo Mana yanyu ni imwe rukumbi. Ariko twe tuyicishaho bugufi.”)
